title: Thora And The Hound Of Asgard
description: When a dog goes missing in Oslo its not normal for Asgard to get involved, but Bragi is a dog with a secret. Can Thora find the dog in time, with the fate of the world at stake?Based on 800 year old Icelandic sagas and set in modern day Oslo, this is the story of Bragi, Terry, Thor and Thora... with a few trolls thrown in for good measure.
author: David A. Burt
